abstract: Sales of luxury goods and home improvement items rose in the quarter, but Wal-Mart shoppers remained cautious.
snippet: Sales of luxury goods and home improvement items rose in the quarter, but Wal-Mart shoppers remained cautious.
lead_paragraph: It was an encouraging start to the year for a broad swath of the nation’s retailers. Major chains like Home Depot and Saks reported earnings on Tuesday that suggested the beginnings of a rebound in categories hit hard by the recession, like home improvement and luxury goods.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Posts Slower Growth as Luxury and Home Goods Rebound
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Posts Slower Growth as Luxury and Home Goods Rebound
